settings.sub_title: Healthy hair that looks attractive can make you feel confident and super attractive. Shiny and Strong hair makes you the cynosure of all eyes.
settings.desc: Taking a few basic hair care steps go a long way in maintaining your hair.  Otherwise, hair fall, unhealthy hair, and lackluster hair is the end result that can well be avoided.  Remember, your hair is an index of your personality which can make or mar your looks.

settings.sub_title: We are a research-oriented  organization. Our goal is to provide every individual with special needs the product that fulfills his yearning.
settings.desc: The term Special Needs is a unique need applicable only to that individual.  It is an idiosyncrasy of the individual, that must be addressed. Therefore, the term Special Needs comes into play whenever an individual differs from the normal majority of category...!
